    About CloudCrusader

    CloudCrusader is the alter ego of Christophe Lams, full time Azure Cloud Solution Architect @ Synergics in collaboration with Microsoft Belgium providing Technical Presales and training for ISV's. Occasionally, he also travels the world as Azure trainer for the American learning partner Opsgility.

     

    Note

    This is a "User Page" (click for a list of all user pages on TechNet Wiki). User pages on TechNet Wiki exist for the following reasons:

    1. To link to these pages from various online profiles, blog posts, etc.
    2. To allow collaboration on filling out such information.
    3. To allow easy editing for filling out such information.
    4. To act as an aggregation or collection of links that help define what a person does.

     

    Certifications

    Christophe has following Microsoft certifications:
